sentences.en: An actor must memorize his part in a play.
sentences.cn: 演员必须背熟自己在剧中的台词.

sentences.en: He studied his map, trying to memorize the way to Rose's street.
sentences.cn: 他研究了地图，试图记住到罗丝家那条街的路。

sentences.en: I don't try to memorize speeches word for word.
sentences.cn: 我不会试图一字不落地记住讲话要说的内容。

sentences.en: I don't understand why we have to memorize conversations.
sentences.cn: 我弄不懂为什么我们一定要记住对话.

sentences.en: I hate to memorize phrases with fixed prepositions from books.
sentences.cn: 我很痛恨从书本上强记需要配上固定介系词的片语.

sentences.en: I shall try to memorize all these phrases.
sentences.cn: 我要熟记所有这些词组。

sentences.en: If you memorize a poem, you can say it without looking at a book.
sentences.cn: 你若记住一首诗, 不看书就能脱口而出.

sentences.en: In the meantime, consult dictionaries and memorize grammatical rules.
sentences.cn: 同时还要查阅词典,记语法规则.

sentences.en: In the meantime, consult dictionaries, memorize grammatical rules.
sentences.cn: 读书时, 要查词典, 记语法规则.

sentences.en: Memorize mode for practicing your memory of the play tables.
sentences.cn: 记忆模式的实践您的记忆中发挥表.

sentences.en: She can not memorize who she is, and where she lived.
sentences.cn: 她记不起来她是谁, 住在什么地方.

sentences.en: The boy can memorize the data easily.
sentences.cn: 这男孩能轻松地记住这些数据。

sentences.en: The hearts of the ring are of you I almost memorize poems.
sentences.cn: 心中响动的是我几乎背熟的你的诗篇.

sentences.en: We just took notes, tried to memorize the books, and got high marks.
sentences.cn: 我们只做笔记, 努力背书, 得高分.

words.tran_cn: 纪念碑，纪念馆；纪念仪式；纪念物
记忆，记忆力；内存，[计] 存储器；回忆

trans.tran_en: to learn words, music etc so that you know them perfectly

trans.tran_cn: 记住，熟记，[计算机科学] 存储，记忆
trans.tran_en: to learn words, music etc so that you know them perfectly
